actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to assign United States trade representation for the Baltic States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that: (1) the U.S. Government should take additional steps to recognize the relationship between the United States and the Baltic States of Lithuania, Latvia, and Estonia; (2) the Secretary of Commerce should assign additional U.S. Government personnel to the U.S. Trade Center in Warsaw, Poland, to serve as the sole U.S. trade representative with the Baltic States; and (3) the Secretary should establish a trade center in such States and transfer such personnel to such center.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate to assign United States trade representation for the Baltic States.
